TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ApplicationPinServices extends Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.PinManagement.PinServices

Docs.summary: Represents pin services available to an application.

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginVerifyPin(string uriToVerify, string pin, class Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.PinManagement.VerifyPinOptions options, class System.AsyncCallback userCallback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginVerifyPin (uriToVerify As String, pin As String, options As VerifyPinOptions, userCallback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult

public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginVerifyPin(System::String ^ uriToVerify, System::String ^ pin, Microsoft::Rtc::Collaboration::PinManagement::VerifyPinOptions ^ options, AsyncCallback ^ userCallback, System::Object ^ state);

Docs.param: The uri for which we need to verify the pin. This can be a global telephone uri, telephone extension or a SIP uri. Cannot be null or empty.
Pin to be verified. Cannot be null or empty.
The optional parameters to be used when verifying given pin.
The method to be called when the asynchronous operation is completed.
A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous operation from other asynchronous operations.
Docs.summary: Begins an asynchronous operation to verify given pin for the uri.
Docs.returns: An IAsyncResult that references the asynchronous operation.
Docs.exception: parameter is null, empty or invalid sip URI or tel URI. parameter is null or empty. parameter contains invalid or restricted signaling headers.

Endpoint is not in valid state to perform this operation.
Pin services uri is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Rtc.Collaboration.PinManagement.PinVerificationResult EndVerifyPin(class System.IAsyncResult result) cil managed
Public Function EndVerifyPin (result As IAsyncResult) As PinVerificationResult

Docs.param: The reference to the pending asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: This method is used to determine whether the corresponding operation completed successfully. This method will wait if the operation has not yet completed
Docs.exception: Thrown when the pin verification for the given uri failed. Applications can use the Reason property to get the failure reason.
Thrown when this method is invoked multiple times using the same asyncResult.
Thrown when the parameter is null.
Thrown when the parameter is invalid.
Thrown when the remote side returns a failure response for the establish request operation.
Thrown when this operation timed out.
Thrown when any of the sub operations of this operation failed due to invalid object state.
Thrown when any of the sub operations of this operation failed due to SIP related errors like connection failure, Authentication failure.
